name: announcements
description: This channel is for important announcements and updates.

name: general
description: This is a general channel for all users to chat and share information.

name: programming
description: This channel is for discussions related to programming, coding, and software development.

name: osl yap
description: This channel is dedicated to discussions about the Origin Scripting Language (OSL) and its applications.

name: off-topic
description: This channel is for off-topic discussions that don't fit into other categories.

name: help-and-support
description: This channel is for users to seek help and support from the community.

name: counting
description: This channel is for counting numbers. Please follow the rules and do not spam.

name: bots
description: This channel is for bot commands and interactions. Use it to interact with bots and automated systems.
